title: Manchester City 3-2 Arsenal: Women’s Super League – live
summary: A key early-season matchup in the Women's Super League features two strong teams, drawing significant attention. Billy Munday provides a minute-by-minute report on the game. Fans are eager to see which team will emerge victorious.

title: Arsenal v West Ham, Manchester United v Sunderland, and more: football – live
summary: Tom Bassam will provide updates on goals and news from various football leagues. Stay informed with the latest happenings in the sport, both locally and nationally. Tune in for comprehensive coverage of matches and results.

title: Leeds United v Tottenham Hotspur: Premier League – live
summary: Leeds seeks a crucial victory to make a statement, while Thomas Frank aims to continue his successful run. The match unfolds with live updates from Scott Murray. Fans are eager to see how the teams perform.

title: Singapore Grand Prix qualifying: Formula One – live
summary: Max Verstappen's competitive edge is putting pressure on McLaren drivers Oscar Piastri and Lando Norris as the season progresses. The dynamic among these top racers is noteworthy as they vie for prominence. Niall McVeigh will delve into this exciting rivalry.

title: Iman Beney sinks Arsenal in thriller to take Manchester City second in WSL
summary: In a thrilling Women's Super League match, Arsenal's Mariona Caldentey and Chloe Kelly both scored to level the game. However, Manchester City's Iman Beney netted a late goal in the 88th minute. This decisive strike secured a 3-2 victory for City.
